import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Breadcrumb, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; export default function NewFeed() { const [events, setEvents] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch("http://localhost:9999/events") .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setEvents(data)) .catch(() => setEvents([])); }, []); return (

  2. Sự kiện nổi bật
